name: Playing Nightmare Creators 4
description:
Playing Nightmare Creators 4 gamifies the PS4 console updating downloading screen. 

We've all been there: excited to play a new game only to be stopped by hours of updates to install first. Playing Nightmare Creators 4 takes that annoying process and makes it fun..well, less horrible.

This is the first game I've created using Gamemaker Studio 4 that I feel I can truly say I created without the use of tutorials (or at least, the game itself isn't just a bastardized tutorial itself).
